sentences.sContent: OK. May I have your last name and first initial, please?
sentences.sContent_eng: OK. May I have your last name and first initial, please?
sentences.sCn: 好的. 请您告诉我贵姓及大名的头一个字母?

sentences.sContent: Each row contains a user ID, an email address, first and last name, phone number, and mailing address.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each row contains a user ID, an email address, first and last name, phone number, and mailing address.
sentences.sCn: 每行包含一个用户 ID、一个电子邮件地址、姓名、电话号码和邮寄地址。

sentences.sContent: Blizzard's new system - called Real ID - means that users will have to post under their real first and last name.
sentences.sContent_eng: Blizzard's new system - called Real ID - means that users will have to post under their real first and last name.
sentences.sCn: 暴雪的新系统被叫做“真实身份”，这将意味着玩家在登录时必须填写他们真实的姓和名。
